author: Sara Germano
title: Super Thor-sday in Pyeongchang
text:
JEONGSEON, South Korea—On the sixth day of these Olympic Games, the clouds parted, the winds abated, the skis sailed and so began the Norwegian conquest.
Gold and silver in the men’s downhill. Silver in the women’s giant slalom. Gold and bronze in the women’s 10-kilometer free cross-country. Gold in men’s 20-kilometer individual biathlon. In a single day, Norwegian Olympians amassed ​six medals, ​thrashing their way to the top of the medal charts and setting their flag atop new heights.
...
